Posts.Content: Aug 19, 2012 09:12PM bron wrote: I have been to my GP this week with the same symptoms and told it was nothing - which is why I have found this page.  It concerned me after reading all your posts that so many of you that have been diagnosed had the same itching prior.  I'm going to get a second opinion.....thanks
